rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
Thee do we serve and Thee do we beseech for help.
Keep us on the right path.

rows.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
rows.translation: The path of those upon whom Thou hast bestowed favors. Not (the path) of those upon whom Thy wrath is brought down, nor of those who go astray.
rows.transliteration: ṣirāṭal ladhīna an`amta `alayhim ghayril maghḍūbi `alayhim walaḍ ḍāllīn
